resource_notes: Requires deep expertise in Kubernetes manifests and Terraform's HCL for EKS. Critical for deployment automation.
alternative_approach: Could use native Kubernetes manifests, but loses IaC benefits and increases management overhead.
risk_factors: High complexity and critical path dependency. Skill gap within the broader team (RISK-004).
mitigation_strategy: Allocate to dedicated DevOps specialist. Mandate peer review by Tech Lead.

task_name: [VND-005] API: Implement Vendor Profile CRUD with Geocoding
resource_notes: Requires external API integration (Mapbox) and specialized database knowledge (PostGIS for zone validation).
alternative_approach: Use a simpler address validation, but this violates business requirements for service area enforcement.
risk_factors: External dependency on Mapbox API (RISK-006). Potential for performance issues with PostGIS queries if not indexed correctly.
mitigation_strategy: Implement circuit breaker and caching for Mapbox API. Index PostGIS geography columns.

task_name: [VND-013] Worker: Develop Background Worker for CSV Processing
resource_notes: Core of the bulk import feature. Requires robust error handling and state management for asynchronous jobs.
alternative_approach: Synchronous processing in the API, but this would time out and is not scalable.
risk_factors: Data corruption on partial failure (RISK-002). Observability challenges for debugging (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Implement Transactional Outbox pattern. Mandate OpenTelemetry for distributed tracing.
